title: The Scars of Abuse: A Tale of Tragedy and Hope
description:
Alicia's fairy-tale romance swiftly morphs into a waking nightmare. Paul, her once-devoted husband, reveals a vicious side that strips her of her joy and self-worth. The bruises, both physical and emotional, mar her existence, yet Alicia refuses to surrender. Armed with the remnants of her shattered spirit, she wages a silent war for freedom.With the whispers of her loved ones guiding her, she steels herself to expose the demons that haunt her. Can she find the resilience to defy her abuser and stitch together the tattered remnants of her life, or will she succumb to the scars of abuse, never to rise again?
All sales are fundraising efforts for Deliverance Charities.
author: Deliverance Charities
